name: Elara
tagline: The first native lending protocol on Zircuit
description: Elara revolutionizes DeFi lending by introducing dynamic liquidity balancing and cross-pool borrowing technologies, optimizing security, rates, and user experience across multiple lending pools. /n/nOur innovative dual-pool market structure consists of a main pool for major assets and satellite pools for LST/LRTs. This system is overseen by an advanced management algorithm that continuously balances liquidity, risk, and yields. The unique design enhances security through risk isolation, while providing a superior experience for both borrowers and lenders with seamless cross-pool operations.
